data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Namin, Saeed Mohamadzade, Korneyev, Severyn V., Parchami-Araghi, Mehrdad, Gilasian, Ebrahim (2015): Revision of the Tephritis maccus species group (Diptera: Tephritidae) with description of a new species from Iran. Zootaxa 3956 (4): 589-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3956.4.10
